objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Rose Gold Plated • Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner centers around a luxurious jewelry theme, showcasing a pair of rose gold wreath studs placed inside a soft gradient circular frame. The design radiates femininity and sophistication with a pastel pink color scheme. A prominent heading (`heading`) at the top uses a bold serif font, followed by a glamorous subheading (`subheading`) describing the product elegantly. The featured product image (`product_image`) is aligned centrally. To the right, a circular price tag (`price`) stands out with bold white text over a warm rose gradient. The features (`description`) are listed below in a modern font, and a clear "SHOP NOW" call-to-action (`cta`) button in a dark rose rectangle (`cta_background`) concludes the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF0F5`
- Blush Pink: `#FFE4E1`
- Rose Gold Gradient: `#FADADD` to `#F8C4B4`
- Price Tag Pink: `#E8A598` to `#D87F73`
- Primary Text: `#9C2760`
- Secondary Text: `#8B3F58`
- Decorative Accent: `#F5B6AB`
product_color: The earrings feature a delicate and elegant design with a soft and feminine color palette. The primary color is a rose gold (#EFA7A1), which forms the base of the setting, giving the jewelry a luxurious, romantic aesthetic. The rose gold smoothly encases round and marquise-cut white crystals (#FFFFFF), adding sparkle and brilliance. Subtle pink enamel accents (#F4C2C2) inside the floral motifs provide depth and contrast. The harmonious blend of rose gold and pink hues highlights each crystal without overpowering its brilliance. This color palette is perfect for an advertisement banner with a soft blush background and rose gold call-to-action elements.
